snippet: The move is part of a broader reorganization, announced last year, which included reducing the number of main business units to 10 from 16.
abstract: Siemens announces plans to cut 2.3 percent of its global workforce, or 7,800 jobs, with 3,300 of those cuts taking place in Germany.
lead_paragraph: The move is part of a broader reorganization, announced last year, which included reducing the number of main business units to 10 from 16.

headline.print_headline: Siemens Prepares to Eliminate Layers of Management
